coreAttributes.authorTag: At the base of the grip, there is a small engraving that reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: Enforcer's baton
coreAttributes.description: A standard issue baton for Enforcers. It is favored for its ability to collapse into a more discrete form factor but offers little in the way of defensive techniques.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] the baton out, letting the weight of the tip extend the shaft to full length.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the end of the baton into the handle and [npc.verb(put)] it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging out with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] in the chest. There is a loud cracking sound as the shaft connects with the aura above [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit the aura around [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, bashing into the aura around [npc2.her] shoulder with the shaft and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to hit [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Enforcer Baton, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
